item.title: It's time to buy the dip on this nuclear energy stock, Citi says
item.description: The bank upgraded the stock to buy from neutral.

item.title: 'Call us crazy' and get this buy-now-pay-later stock, Evercore ISI says
item.description: The firm opened coverage on the stock at an outperform rating.

item.title: This beverage stock gets an upgrade from Piper Sandler as popularity among Gen Z grows
item.description: The firm hiked its rating on the beverage stock to overweight from neutral.

item.title: Wednesday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Stocks' tariff-fueled rout extended for a fourth day, and the S&P 500 closed below 5,000 for the first time since April 2024. What CNBC is watching We...

item.title: These countries could strike trade deals first, benefiting certain stocks, says Jefferies
item.description: There are some stocks that could benefit if tariff deals were to be made between the U.S. and other countries, according to Jefferies.
